and | the boxers were announced to the crowd .
followed by a beautiful rendition of the national anthem .
and | then they began to fight . it lasted for 9 rounds .

output.sentences: The boxers for the black team were standing next to their flag as they mentally prepared for the fights to begin.
The team in gray stood next to their flag as the announcer announced the boxers to the crowd.
A man on a guitar played the national anthem and it was such a beautiful rendition.
The fight lasted several rounds and the fighters each looked awesome.
The fighter in yellow was the winner and he left bearing an international title.
